mapper.insert: insert into GGCOMPANY (COMPANYCODE, COMPANYCNAME, COMPANYTNAME, COMPANYENAME, ADDRESSCNAME, ADDRESSTNAME, ADDRESSENAME, INSURERCNAME, INSURERTNAME, INSURERENAME, UPPERCOMPANYCODE, COMATTRIBUTE, COMTYPE, CENTERIND, COMLEVEL, POSTCODE, PHONENUMBER, FAXNUMBER, MANAGER, WEBADDRESS, SERVICEPHONE, REPORTPHONE, CREATORCODE, CREATETIME, UPDATERCODE, UPDATETIME, VALIDIND, REMARK, FLAG, SHORTCNAME, SHORTTNAME, SHORTENAME, TAXNUMBER, EMAIL, UPPERCOMPATH, TAXREGISTRYNUMBER, TAXREGISTNUMBER) values (#{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companycname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companytname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addresscname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addresstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insurercname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insurertname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insurerename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uppercompanycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comattribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{centerind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faxnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{webaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servicephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shorttname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uppercompath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxregistrynumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxregistnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GGCOMPANY set COMPANYCNAME = #{companycname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYTNAME = #{companytname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYENAME = #{companyename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSCNAME = #{addresscname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSTNAME = #{addresstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSENAME = #{addressename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURERCNAME = #{insurercname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURERTNAME = #{insurertname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSURERENAME = #{insurerename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPPERCOMPANYCODE = #{uppercompanycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMATTRIBUTE = #{comattribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMTYPE = #{comtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CENTERIND = #{centerind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMLEVEL = #{comlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONENUMBER = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAXNUMBER = #{faxnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBADDRESS = #{webaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICEPHONE = #{servicephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTPHONE = #{reportphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATORCODE = #{creatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATERCODE = #{updatercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALIDIND = #{validind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHORTCNAME = #{shortcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHORTTNAME = #{shorttname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHORTENAME = #{shortename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAXNUMBER = #{taxnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPPERCOMPATH = #{uppercompath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAXREGISTRYNUMBER = #{taxregistrynumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAXREGISTNUMBER = #{taxregistnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COMPANYCODE = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select COMPANYCODE, COMPANYCNAME, COMPANYTNAME, COMPANYENAME, ADDRESSCNAME, ADDRESSTNAME, ADDRESSENAME, INSURERCNAME, INSURERTNAME, INSURERENAME, UPPERCOMPANYCODE, COMATTRIBUTE, COMTYPE, CENTERIND, COMLEVEL, POSTCODE, PHONENUMBER, FAXNUMBER, MANAGER, WEBADDRESS, SERVICEPHONE, REPORTPHONE, CREATORCODE, CREATETIME, UPDATERCODE, UPDATETIME, VALIDIND, REMARK, FLAG, SHORTCNAME, SHORTTNAME, SHORTENAME, TAXNUMBER, EMAIL, UPPERCOMPATH, TAXREGISTRYNUMBER, TAXREGISTNUMBER from GGCOMPANY where COMPANYCODE = #{companycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select COMPANYCODE, COMPANYCNAME, COMPANYTNAME, COMPANYENAME, ADDRESSCNAME, ADDRESSTNAME, ADDRESSENAME, INSURERCNAME, INSURERTNAME, INSURERENAME, UPPERCOMPANYCODE, COMATTRIBUTE, COMTYPE, CENTERIND, COMLEVEL, POSTCODE, PHONENUMBER, FAXNUMBER, MANAGER, WEBADDRESS, SERVICEPHONE, REPORTPHONE, CREATORCODE, CREATETIME, UPDATERCODE, UPDATETIME, VALIDIND, REMARK, FLAG, SHORTCNAME, SHORTTNAME, SHORTENAME, TAXNUMBER, EMAIL, UPPERCOMPATH, TAXREGISTRYNUMBER, TAXREGISTNUMBER from GGCOMPANY order by COMLEVEL
